headline: How Adobe’s Firefly Integration into ITG’s Storyteq Platform Could Shape ADBE’s Enterprise Moat
summary: In January 2026, Inspired Thinking Group (ITG) announced it had integrated Adobe Firefly’s generative AI services into its Storyteq content marketing platform, pairing Firefly with ITG’s Halo Intelligence to streamline briefing, workflows, approvals and compliance for enterprise marketers. This collaboration highlights how Adobe’s generative AI is being embedded inside third‑party marketing stacks, potentially deepening its role in enterprise content creation even as new AI rivals...

headline: AI & Business Newsletter | Will AI Really Kill Software?
summary: Imagine being a CEO who can simply tell an AI bot how to handle your company’s human-resource, sales, customer tracking and other back-office functions.  Would you still pay a software vendor millions of dollars a year for those services?  The tool is designed to make it easier for workers who aren’t software engineers to use the company’s Claude Code chatbot to automate work functions, like reviewing emails and organizing computer files.
